about-text:
I really enjoyed developing Sight-Check for over a year and helping so many people! As you can see I decided not to include advertisements or fees, because healthcare should be free for you! 

That's why I open-sourced the code, which means the code is free for everyone to use and explore. Follow Sight-Check on Instagram to suggest features or participate in making Sight-Check better, by visiting our project at Github.
diagnosis-description: This diagnosis will take about 5 minutes or less.
medical-disclaimer: This app can not replace a medical advice.
share-text: Hi, I used Sight-Check to test my eyesight: https://sightcheck.de
